titleStmt.author: Morer, Thomas, 1651-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Mead for James Bonwicke ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: Mr. Morer's sermon at St. Pauls, before the Lord Mayor, Novemb. 5, 1699.

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
